instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook Pro and Air starting when plug magsafe (battery connected)
threads.message:
I have two board with exactly same fail. Even with the battery connected when I plug magsafe mac boots. I know that it is normal for 820-00165-a is normal when battery is not connected but when it is conected it only boots when i press power button

Another board is 820-4924-a. No previous history, no water damage. Just this fail.



P.S, Magsafe is ok because this happens with this two machines only

threads.title: Macbook Pro and Air starting when plug magsafe (battery connected)
threads.message:
The batteries are recognized and charging?

Login to macOS and turn of the machine by software.
Then check again if starts by itself when connect the charher.
